channel.title: Luring
channel.description:
I got lured and lost my hat. This is not a 'i got hacked' topic... I want to know what you guys think of luring. Do you think it's right? Do you think it's wrong? Do [i]you[/i] lure people? I posted it on the RuneScape forums, [s]asking[/s] telling them to make it a rule, even though they probably wont.
Discuss your thoughts of luring/lurers.

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I remember a few months back I got lured for my dragon claws, which was basically my whole bank at the time. It wasn’t a very conventional lure, no one actually approached me or anything. I was in a clan wars world 1-iteming with my claws in the red portal, obviously I had protect item on. I then kill a random person who has nothing on and he drops a cannon barrel. I pick it up, thinking “cool”, and end up being killed by some faggot with an AGS right as I’m about to go out. Apparently the high alch price of claws was lower than the cannon barrel’s, so I ended up keeping the barrel… nice job.

Read full topic

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Speljohan:

Anything done within the game mechanics (without bugs and exploits) should be completely legal. Social engineering (luring) is a form of meta-game, and therefore belongs in the game, and adds excitement to it (for whoever does the lure).

I agree 100% as long as no third party programs, bug, or exploit were / currently being used to do the ‘lure’.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:52, topic:408928”][quote author=nicke924 link=topic=510210.msg3703454#msg3703454 date=1312895867]
If someone lures you, shame on that person. If that person lures you again shame on you.
‘He wanted me to put my hat on, I was so annoyed and unfocused so I just put it on’
Why did you even think about something that stupid?
[/quote]

I don’t know
Hat’s gone, nothing I can do to get it back.[/quote]Bot

Read full topic

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:44, topic:408928”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=510210.msg3703062#msg3703062 date=1312859125]

If you got lured you must have a IQ below 0

WHO GOES INTO WILD WITH A SANTA? LOLOLOL
[/quote]

Read the topic asshole, it wasn’t the wilderness, I was trying to be the ‘lurer’ here. Tables turned and the mother fucker got me instead.[/quote]

Doubt it your just saying that to make yourself feel better and you should try Swaping Santa for lent real quick sense you where not in wild.

Nah I was reading first page you said this

You got lured your dumb, you should Ragequit life.

Shut the fuck up, you would have fell for it. Don't think your smarter than everybody else.

@Davidi2, this isn’t an ‘I got hacked’ topic, … do you want me to post their method? Works well and someone in here who’s rich enough might make a shitload of money off this method.

Read full topic

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

rip4d:

Scamming gets you banned from these forums silly.

Luring is not scamming, it’s not considered scamming to Jagex and I did not scam anyone. I attempted and failed, therefore I have been punished already, losing yet another santa hat. Don’t worry about my consequence plox.

Read full topic

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Scamming gets you banned from these forums silly.

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:42, topic:408928”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=510210.msg3703027#msg3703027 date=1312856991]
When I was 9 I got lured for my new gmaul… These guys were like “come pk with us we all share the loot equally, and you seem like a really strong fighter” or something of that nature.

(please keep in mind that the person met me in varrock and we were talking for like 5 minutes and i thought they were cool… and she was a ‘girl’, i was 9, yeah…)

I knew there was a possibility I could die, so I said to myself if they did anything I would run out fast and keep eating my lobbies.

Well, went out there, entangled, 4 people teaming on me, died. There goes my shiny new maul.
[/quote]

Wasn’t it like, 2m then?
I remember G maul’s being somewhat expensive…[/quote]i remeber at max being like 500k

Read full topic

Oh, so you were trying to scam someone? Since luring = scamming for the most part.

that should of let you know he wants that hat

Frell:

you’re retarded, I would never wear anything worth its full amount outside of safe minigames/ge. You should have taken the santa hat off.

He kept telling me “put it on, we’re going to lose the 200m lure! Do you want 100m or not?!” Pressure while sleepy…

item.title: Luring
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Woo I’m on RuneScape with the new pimp image, screw santa hats, everybody says ‘money plz’ ‘can i have a spair 1m’ ‘can i plz have somthing’

I’m now wearing a top hat, black cane, dragon chain, legs, boots, and gloves… This is better
